tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients_preferences (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_preference TEXT,
    sleep_preference TEXT,
    exercise_preference TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_tracking (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE care_services (
    service_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name TEXT,
    service_description TEXT,
    service_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_condition VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    preference_type VARCHAR(50),
    preference_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Services (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100),
    service_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CareQuality (
    quality_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_id INT,
    care_rating INT,
    care_comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES Services(service_id)
)
